text: Castles in the Air, also known by its working title Orchestra D-2, is a 1919 American silent comedy film, directed by George D. Baker. It stars May Allison, Ben Wilson, and Clarence Burton , and was released on May 12, 1919. ==Cast list== * May Allison as Fortuna Donnelly * Ben Wilson as Eddie Lintner * Clarence Burton as John McArthur * Walter I. Percival as the Honorable Owen Pauncefort * Irene Rich as Mrs. Owen Pauncefort * Mother Anderson as Mrs. Larrymore * Viola Dolan as Esther Jones * Ruth Maurice as Lucy Dalton ==References== == External links == * * * Category:Films directed by George D. Baker Category:Metro Pictures films Category:American films Category:American silent feature films Category:American black-and-white films Category:American comedy films Category:Films based on short fiction Category:1919 comedy films Category:1919 films
title: Castles in the Air (1919 film)
